title: Meditate Like a Buddah
steps: Notice when your mind has wandered
Be kind to your wandering mind
intro: Discover what meditation is through the words of the most wise and famous monk's and writers:
quote1: “The very purpose of meditation is to discipline the mind and reduce afflictive emotions.”
quote2: “The past is gone, the future is not yet here, and if we do not go back to ourselves in the present moment, we cannot be in touch with life.”
quote3: “Meditation is not just blissing out under a mango tree. It completely changes your brain and therefore changes what you are.”
quote4: “If every 8 year old in the world is taught meditation, we will eliminate violence from the world within one generation.”
invitation: Feel free to send me a message about anything you need, from information about my project to collaborations. I would love to hear from you!
